trans-unit.source: Specifies the reason that a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> control was closed.
trans-unit.target: 指定關閉 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> 控制項的原因。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> control was closed because an application was launched.
trans-unit.target: 指定關閉 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> 控制項是因為啟動了應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> control was closed because another application has received the focus.
trans-unit.target: 指定關閉 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> 控制項是因為另一個應用程式收到焦點。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> control was closed because the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Close" /> method was called.
trans-unit.target: 指定關閉 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> 控制項是因為呼叫了 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Close" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> control was closed because one of its items was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 指定關閉 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> 控制項是因為按下其中一個項目。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> control was closed because of keyboard activity, such as the ESC key being pressed.
trans-unit.target: 指定關閉 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> 控制項是由於鍵盤活動，例如按下 ESC 鍵。
